title: 【大洋周】关于匠魂工具增强调整升级需要经验的问题
author: 时光小周
txt_content: https://www.mcmod.cn/class/1056.html就是这个模组怎么调整工具升级需要的经验，介绍里面是说可以调的，最好有图文，谢谢

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
打开config文件夹的TinkerToolLeveling.cfg
    # Base XP for each of the listed tools
    baseXpForTool {
下面列的就是工具的初始所需经验
    # Base XP used when no more specific entry is present for the tool
    defaultBaseXP=500
上面没有的就是这个值
    # How much the XP cost will multiply per level, minimum 2.
    levelMultiplier=2
每次下一级所升级的经验乘数

replies.author: 时光小周
replies.txt_content:
九耀龙翔 发表于 2020-6-28 12:16
打开config文件夹的TinkerToolLeveling.cfg
    # Base XP for each of the listed tools
    baseXpForToo ...
